mapper.sql: SELECT recid , equip_recid , domain , account , alias_enable , account_alias , pwd , uid , gid , group_name , login_shell , home_dir , create_dt , create_ip , create_user , update_dt , update_ip , update_user FROM equip_account

SELECT EA.* , EI.recid as ei_recid , EI.equip_name as ei_equip_name , EI.ip_primary as ei_ip_primary , EI.ip_secondary as ei_ip_secondary , EI.alias_enable as ei_alias_enable , EI.alias as ei_alias , EI.equip_type as ei_equip_type , EI.vendor_name as ei_vendor_name , EI.model_no as ei_model_no , EI.os_recid as ei_os_recid , EI.description as ei_description , EI.create_dt as ei_create_dt , EI.create_ip as ei_create_ip , EI.create_user as ei_create_user , EI.update_dt as ei_update_dt , EI.update_ip as ei_update_ip , EI.update_user as ei_update_user FROM equip_account EA INNER JOIN equip_info EI ON EA.equip_recid = EI.recid
